about_the_game:
Seasonal Wonders


Litchi Town unfolds around a venerable Litchi Tree, its centuries-old branches casting stories into the vibrant dance of seasons. Each season paints the town with distinct scenes, infusing the air with the spirit of cherished festivals and stirring events. Beyond the nostalgic streets, a world of natural wonder beckons—bamboo groves, maple and birch forests, and sun-kissed beaches—all home to hundreds of unique species, inviting endless exploration and surprises.



Farmer's Paradise


Embrace the fertile lands of Litchi Town, where over sixty diverse crops flourish with the changing seasons. Reap, trade, or gift the fruits of your labor, and delve into the vibrant marketplaces that offer everything from floral wonders to mysterious wild botanicals. Vines casually planted by your cottage climb eagerly, transforming your home into a vivid mosaic of greenery and blossom.



Customized Farming


Start by clearing land, planting crops, and tending livestock to build a farm that reflects your personal style. Decorate your cozy cabin with DIY furniture that combines rustic charm with botanical beauty. Dress in the town's finery and adorn your surroundings to reflect your style, making every corner of your domain a story of personal expression.



Rich Relationships


Every townie in Litchi Town has a story to tell, inviting you to intertwine yours with theirs. From small talk to deep, meaningful bonds, the town's social fabric is rich with potential. With a cast of charming characters, forge relationships that might blossom into romance, familial ties, or lifelong friendships.



Cherished Companions


Nurture a delightful assortment of farm animals, from clucking chickens to gentle cows, each growing strong under your attentive care, continually offering fresh eggs and milk. The town also harbors friendly strays—feed them, and they'll follow you home, weaving their way into the fabric of your daily life. And keep an eye out—Litchi Town occasionally surprises its residents with beloved pandas.



Gastronomic Quests


Ignite your culinary passion in Litchi Town. Start with simple ingredients and a modest stove, where culinary magic awaits. No recipe? No worries! Mix rice with eggs to potentially whip up delicious fried rice or venture into the realm of whimsical creations. Gather ingredients from your harvests, the bustling market, or the rich local waters—home to over forty seasonal fish species—each promising a fresh culinary adventure with every catch.

Follow Our Kickstarter Project

name: Litchi Town

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7（SP1）/8/10 64-bit/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Gefore GTX 750Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7（SP1）/8/10 64-bit/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Gefore GTX 1060 6G
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Enter the Litchi Town, a game that turns the rural life into a canvas for your creativity. Forge bonds with the townies and engage in the timeless art of designing your own farm and cultivating friendships. As the seasons shape the landscape, savor the simple pleasures and tranquil moment.
